about_the_game:
Welcome to the relaxing and healing world of nurturing! Here, players will live with adorable cow girls, take care of them, cultivate new little cow girls, and reap rich rewards through nurturing.

The game features both shop and nurturing functions, recreating the experience of managing a cow ranch:

  • Shop Purchases: Buy bread in the shop, carefully feed the cow girls, and observe the eggs they produce.

  • Observation Scale: Place the eggs produced by the cow girls on the scale and see if little cow girls will hatch!

  • Selling Goods: Sell unhatched eggs to earn more resources.

  • Cow Girl Nurturing: Help little cow girls grow quickly by feeding them candy!

The sexy and cute cow girls come in various appearances and experiences! The game is easy to play and fun, with warm and adorable visuals. Come to this little world full of healing and joy, and create your own exclusive cow girl ranch!

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains adult content, including nudity. 
This game does not involve sensitive themes such as sexual assault/non-consensual acts, BDSM, drug/alcohol abuse, and/or self-harm.

name: Dairy Farm

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows10
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: This adult-oriented game combines simulation farm management with Cow Girl nurturing. Players feed Cow Girls, collect their eggs, and check for hatching. Unhatched eggs can be sold, and players can accelerate growth with candy! Enjoy a warm, relaxing experience while exploring this delightful world!
